subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Nextel Cup Series
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Indianapolis 500 winner Dario Franchitti agreed to a multiyear contract to race the No. 40 Dodge for Chip Ganassi beginning in 2008.
snippet: Indianapolis 500 winner Dario Franchitti agreed to a multiyear contract to race the No. 40 Dodge for Chip Ganassi beginning in 2008.
